name: common-core
description: It is a common library related to core methods used in micro services

name: product-catalog
description: Product Catalog API TMF620

name: account-ui
description: Frontend user interface for account management

name: loyalty-management
description: Loyalty Management API: manages loyalty program specifications, members, associated products, and loyalty accounts with balances.

name: service-catalog-ui
description: Service Catalog Management UI: allows users to add, remove, clone, edit, search and manage Service Catalogs, Service Categories, and Service Specifications.

name: sales-management
description: Sales Management API: provides interfaces for Sales Lead and Sales Opportunity to support customer engagement and relationship management.

name: privacy-management
description: Privacy Management API: provides standardized mechanisms for privacy profile types, profiles, and agreements (create, update, retrieval, deletion, notification).

name: dbpm-back-office-user-ticket-management
description: BackOffice User Ticket API: decoupled REST API for user ticket management functionality.

name: common-postgresql
description: Common library related to PostgreSQL database, reusable across services.

name: configuration-management
description: This Service API provides a standardized client interface for LOV (List of Value) data configuration management.

name: roles-and-permissions-ui
description: Roles and Permissions UI (DRAPMS-UI) implementing TMF 672 for managing roles and access permissions.

name: dbpmms-form-ui
description: DPMMS Form Management Service UI — the frontend interface for managing and designing dynamic forms.

name: job-scheduler
description: This API operates scheduling for orders and jobs, triggering them automatically on defined dates.

name: panoramic-order-ui
description: DPANO-OAM-UI Panoramic Order Management UI (Order 360), a frontend module for managing orders in DNext using Angular and TypeScript.

name: audit-log-event-management
description: DALEMS (DNext Audit Log Event Management) — provides audit event tracking and management for logging system actions across DNext microservices.

name: dbpm-usertask-management
description: User Task Management API — acts as a gateway for BPM platform-specific REST APIs enabling workflow and task operation orchestration within DNext.

name: dbeds-http-publisher
description: HTTP Publisher API — supports outbound data delivery via HTTP endpoints, enabling event-based communication between DNext services and external systems.

name: service-ordering
description: TMF641 Service Ordering API — provides standardized mechanisms for creating, updating, and retrieving service orders with related notifications in DNext.

name: communication
description: Communication Management API — manages inter-service and external communication flows in DNext, supporting message routing and integration management.

name: ddhms-collector
description: DDHMS Collector for listening Kafka events and saving them into Elasticsearch.

name: shopping-cart
description: TMF663 - Service providing a standardized mechanism for managing shopping carts, including creation, update, retrieval, and deletion of events.

name: quote
description: CPQ (Customer, Price, Quote) UI for managing quotes within DNext ecosystem.

name: geographic-address
description: TMF673 - Provides a standardized client interface for managing and validating worldwide geographic addresses.

name: payment
description: TMF676 - Standardized Payments API for notifying about performed payments or refunds between systems.

name: resource-inventory
description: TMF639 - Provides a standardized mechanism to query and manipulate the Resource Inventory within the system.

name: rule-engine
description: Orbitant Rule Engine Management service that handles rule-based logic and workflow automation.

name: dbpm-form-management
description: DBPMMS Form Management API — decoupled REST API for BPM/Workflow Engine providing O&M functionality for form management.

name: agreement
description: TMF651 - Agreement Management API providing standardized mechanisms to manage agreements, especially in partner contexts.

name: payment-method
description: TMF670 - API for managing and supporting customer payment methods such as vouchers, coupons, and transfers.

name: order-generation
description: Order Generation Management API — generates and manages orders in the DNext platform using Java, Spring, and MongoDB.

name: dbpm-operate-management
description: DBPMMS Operate Management API — handles process instance operations and interactions with the Camunda BPM engine.

name: service-inventory
description: TMF638 Service Inventory API — provides standardized mechanisms to query and manipulate service inventory records in DNext.

name: business-event-detector-management
description: Business Event Detector Management — detects and manages business events using OpenAPI-generated Spring Boot stubs.

name: party-role
description: TMF669 Party Role API — standardized mechanism to manage general party roles with CRUD and event notification operations.

name: dalems-collector
description: DALEMS Collector — listens to Kafka events and stores them in Elasticsearch for audit and monitoring purposes.

name: dbo-userticket-ui
description: DNext Backoffice User Ticket UI — Angular/TypeScript-based user interface for managing user tasks within the backoffice system.

name: document-ui
description: DNext Document UI — Angular-based frontend for managing document entities and configurations within the DNext platform.

name: service-catalog
description: DNext Service Catalog API — TMF633-based backend service managing the lifecycle of service catalog elements.

name: href-map
description: DNext Href Map Service — backend component maintaining DNS domain names and related relative href path mappings.

name: party-ui
description: DNext Party UI — Angular frontend for managing individual or organizational party information before role assignment.

name: trouble-ticket
description: DNext Trouble Ticket API — TMF632-based backend for managing the lifecycle of customer trouble tickets and related operations.

name: customer-ui
description: DNext Customer UI — Angular-based frontend for managing customer-related data and interactions within the DNext ecosystem.

name: party
description: DNext Party Management API — TMF632-compliant backend for creating, updating, and retrieving individual or organizational party data.

name: product-catalog-ui
description: DNext Product Catalog UI — Angular-based frontend for managing product catalog configurations and offerings.

name: resource-catalog
description: TMF634 - The Resource Catalog Management API allows the management of the entire lifecycle of resource catalog elements and their consultation during ordering processes.

name: product-inventory
description: TMF637 - Provides standardized mechanisms for product inventory management, including creation, updates, and retrieval of product representations and related lifecycle events.

name: backoffice
description: DNext Backoffice API — backend service responsible for managing task execution, configuration, and integration of backoffice operations.

name: dcomms-ui
description: DNext Communication Management UI — Angular and TypeScript-based interface for managing communication configurations and messaging workflows.

name: document
description: TMF667 - Document Management API that provides operations to synchronize, upload, and view documents such as agreements or customer bills.

name: price-engine
description: DNext Price Engine API — calculates one-time and recurring service charges, grouping prices by type for accurate billing and analysis.

name: resource-catalog-ui
description: DNext Resource Catalog UI — Angular frontend that enables managing and visualizing resource catalogs, categories, and related entities.

name: product-ordering-fulfillment-orchestration
description: DNext Product Ordering Fulfillment Orchestration — manages the end-to-end order fulfillment process, including product delivery and return operations.

name: customer-journey
description: Customer Journey API — manages customer service interactions and relations across multiple backend systems.

name: activity-history
description: DNext Activity History — backend API that maintains structured logs of system events, capturing activity data for auditing and monitoring purposes.

name: activity-history-ui
description: DNext Activity History UI — Angular/TypeScript-based frontend for managing and viewing activity history logs in the DNext platform.

name: resource-ordering
description: TMF652 - Resource Ordering API — manages creation, update, and retrieval of resource orders, providing standardized order lifecycle operations.

name: promotion-management
description: DNext Promotion Management API — backend service managing promotional rules, eligibility criteria, and campaign configurations.

name: product-ordering
description: TMF622 - Product Ordering API — provides standardized mechanisms for placing and managing product orders, ensuring CRM and order system consistency.

name: configuration-management-ui
description: DNext Configuration Management UI — Angular-based interface for configuring, managing, and deploying environment and platform settings.

name: roles-and-permissions
description: TMF672 - Roles and Permissions API — manages user roles and permission sets to control access to DNext system data and services.

name: reference-management
description: DNext Reference Management API — provides standardized management of reference data such as markets, channels, and other shared resources.

name: product-offering-qualification
description: TMF679 - Product Offering Qualification API — enables commercial eligibility checks for product offerings during the pre-ordering process.

name: storage
description: DNext Storage Service — backend API providing AWS S3-compatible operations for object storage management and file handling.

name: id-generation-management
description: DNext ID Generation Management — backend service that manages resources controlling the formatting of generated IDs for DNext resources.

name: service-ordering-fulfillment-orchestration
description: DNext Service Ordering Fulfillment Orchestration — backend microservice that handles order processing, shipment, inventory, and delivery orchestration based on TMF standards.

name: resource-ordering-fulfillment-orchestration
description: DNext Resource Ordering Fulfillment Orchestration — backend service that manages the orchestration of resource-level fulfillment operations, aligned with order fulfillment processes.

name: partner
description: DNext Partnership Management — API defining standardized mechanisms for managing partnerships and role types between entities such as Buyer, Seller, and Developer.

name: party-interaction-management
description: DNext Party Interaction Management — TMF683-based backend service that captures and manages user interactions for reuse and analytical insights.

name: data-history-management
description: DNext Data History Management — backend service for persisting, retrieving, and managing historical data across various DNext resources.

name: account
description: DNext Account Management — TMF666-based backend API providing mechanisms for billing, settlement, and financial account management in B2B/B2B2C contexts.

name: customer
description: DNext Customer Management — TMF629-compliant backend API for managing customer lifecycle operations including creation, update, and notification.
